metadata.source: Game8.co comprehensive database + Fextralife wiki for complete vehicle systems + Game8 tools database

vehicle_components.scout_ornithopter_notes: Storage is intentionally limited to Mk4 only - no Mk5/6 storage exists for Scout Ornithopters
vehicle_components.assault_ornithopter_notes: Requires 6 wings per ornithopter. Storage and Rocket Launcher compete for same slot. Thruster is standalone.
vehicle_components.carrier_ornithopter_notes: Only available at Mk6. Requires 2 side hulls, 2 tail hulls, and 8 wings per ornithopter. Thruster is optional standalone module.
vehicle_components.sandcrawler_assembly_notes: Place chassis with Construction Tool, attach all other parts with Welding Torch. All treads must be same type.
vehicle_components.sandcrawler_notes: Only available at Mk6. Heavy-duty spice collector with highest storage capacity. Requires multiple treads per vehicle.

cutteray_mk6.description: High-tier gathering tool for mining and resource extraction

survey_probe.description: Ammunition for Survey Probe Launcher to map local areas

handheld_resource_scanner.description: Projects scan to mark resource information on map

binoculars.description: View and mark objects at distance, linked to paracompass

rattler_boost_module_mk4.description: Advanced unique boost module with spice enhancement

rattler_boost_module_mk5.description: Elite unique boost module for maximum performance

night_rider_sandbike_boost_mk5.description: Elite stealth boost for night operations

steady_assault_boost_module_mk5.description: Unique assault boost module for sustained combat operations

bigger_buggy_boot_mk4.description: Advanced unique buggy storage with improved capacity

bigger_buggy_boot_mk5.description: Elite buggy storage for maximum storage capacity

focused_buggy_cutteray_mk3.description: Unique mining laser with increased Carbon and Erythrite yield

focused_buggy_cutteray_mk4.description: Advanced unique mining laser with enhanced precision

focused_buggy_cutteray_mk5.description: Elite mining laser with increased Jasmium yield

focused_buggy_cutteray_mk6.description: Ultimate mining laser with increased Titanium and Stravidium Mass yield

stormrider_boost_module_mk6.description: Ultimate boost module for extreme weather conditions

silicone_block.description: A block of plastic refined from Flour Sand in a Chemical Refinery

cobalt_paste.description: A dissolution of Cobalt, refined from Erythrite Crystal from the Hagga Rift at a Chemical Refinery

salvaged_metal.description: Raw salvage material found in wreckage

particle_capacitor.description: Energy storage component for vehicle systems (base material - can only be found/looted)

complex_machinery.description: Sophisticated mechanical components for advanced vehicles (base material - can only be found/looted)

advanced_machinery.description: An Infrastructure crafting component used in plastanium tier crafting

tri_forged_hydraulic_piston.description: High-pressure hydraulic component for heavy vehicles

spice_infused_plastanium_dust.description: Found only, cannot be crafted. A fabrication component used in unique items. Truly Unique items often rely on spice-infused metal to enhance their qualities.

hydraulic_piston.description: Found only, cannot be crafted. A component used to craft vehicle engines. The Great Houses have a stranglehold on this type of component on Arrakis.

advanced_servoks.description: Found only, cannot be crafted. A fabrication component used in vehicles such as Sandbikes. Found in Old Imperial remnants, such as Imperial Testing Stations.

plasteel_plate.description: Found only, cannot be crafted. A crafting component found in the Deep Desert.

carbide_scraps.description: Found only, cannot be crafted. This industrial byproduct is closely guarded by the Maas Kharet in their most sacred site.

diamondine_dust.description: Found only, cannot be crafted. This industrial byproduct is closely guarded by the Maas Kharet in their most sacred site.

plasteel_composite_armor_plating.description: An Armor crafting component used in plastanium tier crafting

armor_plating.description: Strengthened plating can be liberated from those who make use of them in their heavy armor, and repurposed to other ends
